common.codeTooShort: Code must be at least 5 characters

home.title: AI Hub Apps
home.description: Interact with various AI models through a simple interface

appsList.title: AI Apps
appsList.subtitle: Choose an application to start a conversation

appChat.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the chat?
appChat.starterPromptsSubtitle: Choose a prompt below to get started quickly
appChat.examplePrompts: Here are some example prompts to get you started
appChat.noMessagesSubtitle: Start a conversation by sending a message!

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: We couldn't find the page you were looking for.

examples.helpWithTask: Help me brainstorm ideas for my project
examples.explainConcept: Explain a complex topic in simple terms

descriptions.gpt-3.5-turbo: Fast and efficient model for most everyday tasks and conversations
descriptions.gpt-4: Advanced model with strong reasoning and knowledge capabilities
descriptions.claude-3-opus: Anthropic's most capable model with exceptional reasoning abilities
descriptions.claude-3-sonnet: Balanced performance and value for enterprise and everyday tasks
descriptions.gemini-1.5-flash: Google's versatile model optimized for text and code tasks
descriptions.local-vllm: Advanced model with strong reasoning and knowledge capabilities

error.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
error.apiKeyMissing: API key for model not found

appConfig.title: Configuration
appConfig.temperatureDescription: Controls randomness: Lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative.
appConfig.systemPromptDescription: Instructions for the AI at the beginning of the conversation.

serverErrors.missingFeedbackFields: Missing required fields: messageId, appId, chatId, and rating are required
serverErrors.apiKeyNotFound: API key not found for provider: {provider}
serverErrors.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed for {provider} API. Please check your API key.
serverErrors.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded for {provider} API. Please try again later.
serverErrors.serviceError: {provider} API service error. The service may be experiencing issues.
serverErrors.requestTimeout: Request timed out after {timeout} seconds. The model may be experiencing high load.
serverErrors.llmApiError: LLM API request failed with status {status}
serverErrors.connectionRefused: Connection refused while trying to access {provider} API for model {model}. Please check your connection or server configuration.
serverErrors.modelAccessDenied: API key not allowed to access this model

toolErrors.UNSUPPORTED_PROTOCOL: Only HTTP and HTTPS URLs are supported.
toolErrors.AUTH_REQUIRED: Authentication is required to access this page.
toolErrors.CONTENT_NOT_FOUND: Could not find content in the webpage.
toolErrors.TIMEOUT: Request timed out while loading the webpage.
toolErrors.TLS_ERROR: Certificate error encountered. Please contact your administrator.
toolErrors.EXTRACTION_FAILED: Failed to extract content from webpage.

descriptions.keep: Keep the original style of the text.
descriptions.concise: Provide shorter and more direct responses. Be brief and to the point.
descriptions.formal: Provide clear, professional and polished responses using formal language.
descriptions.explanatory: Provide educational responses that explain concepts clearly, as if teaching a student.
descriptions.creative: Provide imaginative and artistic responses, using metaphors and analogies.
descriptions.persuasive: Provide convincing and compelling responses, using rhetorical techniques.
descriptions.humorous: Provide light-hearted and funny responses, using jokes and puns.
descriptions.empathetic: Provide compassionate and understanding responses, showing empathy and support.
descriptions.friendly: Provide warm and approachable responses, using a friendly tone.
descriptions.technical: Provide detailed and precise responses, using technical language.
descriptions.casual: Provide relaxed and informal responses, using everyday language.
descriptions.detailed: Provide thorough and comprehensive responses, covering all aspects of the topic.
descriptions.analytical: Provide logical and critical responses, analyzing the topic in depth.
descriptions.assertive: Provide confident and strong responses, taking a clear stance.

template.title: Choose App Template
template.description: Start with an existing app as a template, or create from scratch
template.createFromScratchDescription: Start with a blank app configuration
template.noApps: No apps found matching your search

method.title: Creation Method
method.description: How would you like to create your app?
method.instruction: Choose how you want to create your app:
method.aiDescription: Describe what your app should do, and AI will generate the configuration for you.
method.manualDescription: Configure your app step by step with full control over all settings.
method.templateDescription: Start with the configuration from "{templateName}" and customize it.

ai.title: AI Generation
ai.description: Describe what your app should do
ai.promptPlaceholder: Example: Create a meeting summarizer app that takes meeting notes and extracts key points, action items, and decisions...
ai.success: App configuration generated successfully! You can review and modify it in the next steps.

error.network: Network error occurred while generating app

system.title: System Instructions
system.description: Define how your app should behave
system.promptPlaceholder: Enter system instructions that define how the AI should behave...

variables.title: Variables
variables.instruction: Variables allow users to customize the app behavior. They can be used in the prompt template with {{variableName}} syntax.
variables.name: Name
variables.label: Label

tools.title: Tools
tools.instruction: Select the tools that will be available to your app. Tools extend the capabilities of the AI assistant.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.instruction: Configure advanced settings for your app.

review.title: Review & Create
review.instruction: Review your app configuration before creating it.
review.warning: Once created, you can edit the app configuration but cannot change its ID. Make sure the ID is unique and descriptive.

edit.title: Edit Model
edit.subtitle: Manage model configuration for {{name}}
edit.subtitleNew: Create a new AI model configuration
edit.configurationDesc: Advanced configuration options for the model
edit.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
edit.noApps: No apps are currently using this model

hints.modelId: Unique identifier for this model configuration
hints.apiModelId: The model ID used in API calls to the provider

pages.title: Pages Administration
pages.subtitle: Manage static pages displayed in the application
pages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
